about.name: Dubai
about.info_text: Dubai is a dazzling city located in the United Arab Emirates known for its remarkable modern architecture, luxury shopping, and vibrant culture. Nestled on the shores of the Persian Gulf, Dubai is a global hub for business and leisure. The city boasts iconic skyscrapers like the Burj Khalifa, luxurious shopping malls, and a diverse culinary scene. Visitors can explore the traditional markets or 'souks' to experience the rich heritage of Dubai while enjoying the opulent lifestyle the city offers.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 3.4 million
Emirate: Dubai
Time Zone: Gulf Standard Time (UTC+04:00)
Language: Arabic, English
Currency: UAE Dirham (AED)
about.climate_text: Dubai has a desert climate with extremely hot and sunny summers and milder winters. Rainfall is rare, and the city is known for its year-round sunshine, making it a popular destination for sun-seekers.

attractions_card.title: Burj Khalifa
attractions_card.description: The Burj Khalifa is the tallest building in the world, offering breathtaking views of the city from its observation decks and providing a glimpse into Dubai's architectural prowess.

attractions_card.title: Palm Jumeirah
attractions_card.description: Palm Jumeirah is an artificial island in the shape of a palm tree, known for its luxury resorts, beautiful beaches, and stunning oceanfront villas.

attractions_card.title: Dubai Mall
attractions_card.description: Dubai Mall is one of the largest shopping malls globally, featuring a vast array of retail outlets, entertainment options, and attractions, including the Dubai Aquarium and Underwater Zoo.

attractions_card.title: Burj Al Arab
attractions_card.description: The Burj Al Arab is a seven-star luxury hotel known for its distinctive sail-shaped design, world-class amenities, and panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf.

attractions_card.title: Dubai Marina
attractions_card.description: Dubai Marina is a waterfront district known for its stunning skyscrapers, yachts, and a bustling dining and entertainment scene.

attractions_card.title: Ski Dubai
attractions_card.description: Ski Dubai is an indoor ski resort located within the Mall of the Emirates, offering skiing, snowboarding, and snow play in a desert city.

attractions_card.title: Gold Souk
attractions_card.description: The Gold Souk in Deira is a renowned market for gold and jewelry, with a dazzling array of designs and craftsmanship.

attractions_card.title: Dubai Fountain
attractions_card.description: The Dubai Fountain is a captivating water and light show located at the base of the Burj Khalifa, set on the artificial lake at the foot of the tower.

food_card.title: Shawarma
food_card.description: Shawarma is a popular street food in Dubai, featuring seasoned and slow-roasted meat wrapped in flatbread and garnished with a variety of condiments.

food_card.title: Falafel
food_card.description: Dubai offers delectable falafel, a deep-fried ball or patty made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, often served in a pita or as a snack.

food_card.title: Hummus
food_card.description: Hummus is a beloved Middle Eastern dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic, often served with pita bread or as an accompaniment to various dishes.

food_card.title: Al Harees
food_card.description: Al Harees is a traditional Emirati dish made from wheat and meat, slow-cooked until it reaches a unique porridge-like consistency.

food_card.title: Biryani
food_card.description: Biryani, a fragrant and flavorful rice dish with various spices and meat, is a popular choice in Dubai's diverse culinary scene.

hotels_card.title: Burj Al Arab Jumeirah
hotels_card.description: Burj Al Arab Jumeirah is a world-renowned luxury hotel with opulent suites, impeccable service, and exceptional dining experiences.

hotels_card.title: Atlantis The Palm
hotels_card.description: Atlantis The Palm is a majestic resort on the Palm Jumeirah island, featuring an underwater aquarium, thrilling water park, and a range of marine adventures.

hotels_card.title: JW Marriott Marquis Hotel Dubai
hotels_card.description: The JW Marriott Marquis Hotel offers sophisticated accommodations, diverse dining options, and stunning city views from its prime location.

hotels_card.title: Raffles Dubai
hotels_card.description: Raffles Dubai is an elegant and luxurious hotel with spacious rooms, a botanical garden, and exceptional service in the heart of the city.

hotels_card.title: Armani Hotel Dubai
hotels_card.description: The Armani Hotel in the Burj Khalifa offers chic and contemporary design, along with access to designer shops and fine dining.

transport_card.title: Dubai Metro
transport_card.description: The Dubai Metro is a modern and efficient metro system that connects various parts of the city, providing convenient transportation for residents and tourists.

transport_card.title: Dubai Tram
transport_card.description: The Dubai Tram is a light rail system that serves the Dubai Marina and JBR areas, connecting commuters to the Dubai Metro.

transport_card.title: Taxis and Ride-Sharing
transport_card.description: Taxis and ride-sharing services like Uber and Careem are readily available in Dubai and are a popular mode of transportation within the city.

transport_card.title: Dubai International Airport
transport_card.description: Dubai International Airport (DXB) is one of the busiest airports in the world, serving as a major international gateway to Dubai and the UAE.
